I am a DR Congo native, being involved in the development of technology has always been my passion. I am a Full Stack developer. I consider myself to have an exciting, passionate and enthusiastic disposition to learn which has helped me in making new connections and interacting with the world around me. Doing so helped me to develop my communication skills and ability to work with others. I want to use my knowledge and my skills to participate in the group's projects, in the problems that need to be solved, and willing to learn. The world that we are living in has exposed us to the development of technology, and to be a software developer which is part of the technology makes me feel useful and available for society.
